abstract: Negotiations to end NBA lockout collapse once again, cancelling additional two weeks of basketball and threatening loss of entire season; no new negotiations have yet been scheduled.
snippet: Despite a furious three days of bargaining and the assistance of a federal mediator, no new additional meetings are scheduled.
lead_paragraph: Despite a furious three days of bargaining and the assistance of a federal mediator, no new additional meetings are scheduled.

headline.main: N.B.A. Talks Break Off, Threatening November Games
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Talks Break Off, Threatening November Games
headline.seo: N.B.A. Talks Break Off, Threatening November Games
